author: wrowe
msg: Fix rootpath detection for Win9X so we don't go stat'ing the volume.
In 95, we lie outright because 95 can't stat a volume.  This patch
was partially committed in the previous commit.

msg: switch {case} and default: are probably better for handling this case.
